title: Reginaldo Haslett-Marroquin -- Decolonizing and Indigenizing Regenerative Agriculture (part 2 of 3)

tasks.task: Harvest chickens and process them on a farm.
subtasks: Plan and prepare the processing facility.
Train farm workers in indigenous agricultural practices.
Implement rotational grazing for chickens inside hazelnut groves.
Monitor and manage chicken health and nutrition.
Harvest and market hazelnuts from the groves.
Collaborate with regional community members for chicken processing.
Build a brand for regenerative chicken products.
Establish regional partnerships for poultry production and processing.

tasks.task: ** Running a regenerative poultry farm that integrates Indigenous knowledge and practices.
